alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 5:26PM CDT until July 01 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 525 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gypsum, or 8 miles southeast of Salina, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Automated airport sensor reported and radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salina, Assaria, Gypsum, Smolan, Falun, Salina Airport and Kipp. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 80 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 249 and 250. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
